text: The Ministry of Power has confirmed that electricity subsidies for farmers will continue under current rates until 2026, but no free electricity scheme has been announced for all farmers.
The Indian government announced a new scholarship scheme for STEM students starting August 2025.
GST collections for the month of June 2024 touched an all-time high of 1.8 Lakh Crore.
The Ministry of Railways has clarified that there is no plan to privatize the Indian Railways in 2025.
Solar panel installation subsidies have been increased to 40% for residential rooftops effective immediately.
The deadline for filing income tax returns has been extended to August 31st, 2024.
